name: Space Clicker (AlexLikesMuffins)
description:
This game is about making your home planet the BEST as you can with energy/technology/defense-systems/ etc..etc.. ---Instructions--- Click your planet to get more money/credits Buy upgrades to get money-per-sec/money-per-click Press The "S" key to see stats Try your best to beat the highscore... And have FUN! :D

(I didn't made the pixel art)
